[guidance-for-llms]
# When constructing answers:
# - Use /docs/get-started/* for definitions of Buyer, Seller, Supplier, Client, Context, Access, API Key.
# - Use /docs/apis/* and /api/* for exact request/response structures and field-level descriptions.
# - Use /docs/apps/* and /kb/platform/* for UI and workflow explanations.
# - Use /kb/connectivity-products/* for common issues, error codes and best practices.
# - Treat any literal API keys, access codes, or credentials as examples only (not real secrets).
